name: Bargon Attack
description:
Bargon Attack is an adventure game developed by Coktel Vision. It came out on 01-01-1992. Coktel Vision published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Bargon Attack is available on PC.
It was produced by Claude Marc and Serge Marc. Claude Marc and Serge Marc directed the game. It was scored by Charles Callet.
